name: FRigUnit_AimBoneMath
doc:
Outputs an aligned transform of a primary and secondary axis of an input transform to a world target.
Note: This node operates in world space!

InputTransform: The transform (in global space) before the aim was applied (optional)
Primary: The primary target for the aim
Secondary: The secondary target for the aim - also referred to as PoleVector / UpVector
Weight: The weight of the change - how much the change should be applied
DebugSettings: The debug setting for the node
